ammo_mods.name: Brain Rot
ammo_mods.description: Bullets deal toxic damage. Each bullet has a chance to temporarily turn a normal or special enemy into an ally.

major_augments.title: Plague
major_augments.description: The charmed enemy has a chance to turn other enemies.

major_augments.title: Pheromone
major_augments.description: The charmed enemy distracts nearby normal and special enemies for a short time.

major_augments.title: Big Game
major_augments.description: Brain Rot can charm elite enemies.

minor_augments.title: Extension
minor_augments.description: Brain Rot duration is slightly increased.

minor_augments.title: Haste
minor_augments.description: Armor plates have more damage mitigation.

minor_augments.title: Explosive
minor_augments.description: Brain Rot cooldown is slightly reduced.

ammo_mods.name: Cryo Freeze
ammo_mods.description: Bullets deal frost damage. Each bullet has a chance to slow a normal or special enemy and increase the damage they receive.

major_augments.title: Big Game
major_augments.description: Cryo Freeze can slow elite enemies.

major_augments.title: Ice Cloud
major_augments.description: Enemies that are killed while frozen may leave a cloud that slows enemies.

minor_augments.title: Freezer Burn
minor_augments.description: Slightly increase damage to frozen enemies.

minor_augments.title: Liquid Nitrogen
minor_augments.description: Significantly increase your chance for Cryo Freeze to activate.

ammo_mods.name: Dead Wire
ammo_mods.description: Bullets deal electric damage. Each bullet has a chance to stun a normal or special enemy, causing them to generate an electric damage field.

major_augments.title: Chain Lighting
major_augments.description: The stunned enemy can spread the stun to others.

major_augments.title: Big Game
major_augments.description: Dead Wire can stun elite enemies.

major_augments.title: Lighting Strike
major_augments.description: A bolt of lightning strikes from above, stunning all normal and special enemies in the area.

minor_augments.title: High Voltage
minor_augments.description: Dead Wire deals slightly more damage.

minor_augments.title: Haste
minor_augments.description: Dead Wire cooldown is slightly reduced.

minor_augments.title: Extension
minor_augments.description: The stun and electric field last longer.

ammo_mods.name: Napalm Burst
ammo_mods.description: Bullets deal fire damage. Each bullet has a chance to apply a burn effect on normal and special enemies, dealing damage over time.

major_augments.title: Big Game
major_augments.description: Napalm Burst can burn elite enemies.

minor_augments.title: Incendiary
minor_augments.description: Each damage tick has a small chance to spread to a nearby enemy.

minor_augments.title: Contact Burn
minor_augments.description: Initial burn effect deals more damage.

ammo_mods.name: Shadow Rift
ammo_mods.description: Bullets deal shadow damage. Each bullet has a chance to spawn a black hole on a normal or special enemy, warping away those nearby and dropping some from the air at lethal speed.

major_augments.title: Big Game
major_augments.description: Shadow Rift can activate on elite enemies.

major_augments.title: Topple Danger
major_augments.description: Warp one enemy that deals shadow damage to others.

major_augments.title: Explosive Rain
major_augments.description: Enemies that are dropped from portals will explode on contact with the ground.

minor_augments.title: Targeted
minor_augments.description: Dropped enemies will fall on other enemies.

minor_augments.title: Supermassive
minor_augments.description: The singularity's lethal radius is increased and can kill more enemies.

ammo_mods.name: Light Mend
ammo_mods.description: Each bullet has a chance to transform a normal or Special enemy's health into a healing glyph that moves to nearby injured allies.

major_augments.title: Antibiotic
major_augments.description: The healing glyph now damages enemies that touch it, but its lifetime is reduced.

major_augments.title: Big Game
major_augments.description: Light Mend can activate on Elite enemies, dropping three more healing glyphs.

major_augments.title: Dual Action
major_augments.description: Consuming a healing glyph will temporarily allow you to heal faster.

minor_augments.title: Longer Life
minor_augments.description: The healing glyphâ€™s lifetime is increased.

minor_augments.title: Extra Strength
minor_augments.description: The healing glyph replenishes more health when consumed.

minor_augments.title: Express Remedy
minor_augments.description: Increase the range that the glyph will move to an ally.
